Why SozuCash?

Free Forever

No transaction fees, no maintenance costs.

Permissionless Access

Anyone can open an account instantly.

Instant Final Settlement

Transactions are confirmed in seconds.

Anonymous by Design

Your funds, your privacy, your control.

On-Chain Yield

Earn from your deposits while you spend.

Powered by Mantle Network

SozuCash runs on Mantle Network — a next-gen EVM-compatible blockchain delivering:

Ultra-low costs

High scalability

Global reach

By leveraging Mantle, we bring USDC (digital dollars) to anyone, anywhere — with the speed and smoothness of Google Pay, but fully self-custodial and trustless.

How It Works

1

Open the app

instantly get your free EVM wallet.

2

Start transacting

send and receive USDC in seconds.

3

Earn while you hold

your balance generates yield automatically.
